comment: Chris's time zone talk was both hilarious and educational! His weather app struggles resonated with every developer in the room.
Great talk on time zone pitfalls! Chris made a complex topic approachable with humor and practical examples.
Fantastic presentation! Chris turned time zone horror stories into valuable learning experiences. So relatable!
Excellent talk with great humor! The WeatherKit time zone quirks section saved me from future headaches.
Brilliant and entertaining! Chris made time zones less scary and more manageable. Love the practical tips.
Great lighthearted approach to a complex topic. Chris's weather app journey was both amusing and instructive.
